mining_laser.name: Mining Laser
mining_laser.desc: Allows mining of ore from asteroids. Combat use not recommended.

impulse_laser.name: Impulse Laser
impulse_laser.desc: Basic laser, mostly used for fighting vermin.

gatling_laser.name: Gatling Laser
gatling_laser.desc: Fast-firing combat laser with high damage output. Also has some point-defense capability.

plasma_beam.name: Plasma Beam
plasma_beam.desc: Large energy weapon. Deals major damage, but doesn't have any point-defense capability.

gatling_battery.name: Gatling Battery
gatling_battery.desc: Extremely fast-firing weapon. Good against both ships and missiles.
